question: Which government agency has received the maximum funding for research?
explanation: Amongst the 12 Central Government major scientific agencies, DRDO accounted for the maximum share of 31.6% of R&D expenditure followed by DOS (19.0%), ICAR (11.1%), DAE (10.8%), CSIR (9.5%) and DST (7.3%), DBT ( 3.7%) and ICMR (3.1%),MoES (2.3%), MEITY (0.8%), MoEFCC (0.5%), MNRE (0.1%).
